nodes.text: Balamak was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Mid Rim. Sometime before the Battle of Scarif, a battle was fought on Balamak, the battle was denoted by red lining on the garb of senator Vasp Vaspar. The population of Balamak was brutally suppressed by the New Republic according to the news feeds of the First Order. The stormtrooper FN-2187 saw one such broadcast in a morale session during his training shortly before his deployment to the planet Jakku.

Balamak was first mentioned in Tatooine Manhunt, an adventure supplement for the Star Wars Legends Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game made by West End Games. The book was published in 1988 and was written by Bill Slavicsek and Daniel Greenburg. The location was confirmed to be canon when it was mentioned in the "Finn" section of the anthology collection Before the Awakening, which was written by Greg Rucka and released in 2015.
